content: crochet adidas baby sneakers if you going to make crochet baby booties you might as well make the coolest crochet newborn shoes if you are looking for crochet for boys this is a great pattern but this works just as great for girls there are very few crochet adidas english pattern on youtube and all the other crochet adidas patterns aren t free this one is i hope you enjoy material yarn deborah norville everyday yarn hook 3mm littlejohn s yarn
